content: I came across this recently, it had me in stiches and I have no idea if it's serious. It's a patent application for walking through walls. There are several gems in here including "Upon reading his explanation, I realized that the thunderstorm is actually a hyperspace physics phenomenom." and my personal favourite "How to generate negative mass, traverse hyperspace and walk through walls, even with a dog". http://www.scribd.com/doc/20946878/Walking-through-walls-US20060014125A1 A quick Google and there are several patents by the same chap JOHN QUINCY ST. CLAIR. http://www.google.co.uk/patents?id=nB-dAAAAEBAJ&pg=PA1&dq=US2003/0197093Al&hl=en&sa=X&ei=iUHzTsy-HI3H8gPMo8jGAQ&ved=0CDcQ6AEwAA#v=onepage&q=US2003%2F0197093Al&f=false
title: How to generate negative mass, traverse hyperspace and walk through walls, even with a dog.
name: how-to-generate-negative-mass-traverse-hyperspace-and-walk-through-walls-even-with-a-dog
